descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~~
~True Blood~
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~Mr.Moe\'s Vampire Tweaks~
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Desribtion

-Some Vampire Tweaks listed below, only alters the vanilla Vampires, this dont alter vampirelords or any DLC stuff


Install

-copy all files in your data folder


Uninstall

- delete 	trueblood.esp  
			/scripts/spelltoggle.pex 
			/scripts/Source/spelltoggle.pex			

			
Requirements

-Dawnguard


Reanimate

- works on all corpses with a min duration of 5min
	stage 2 10min
	stage 3 15min	
	stage 4	20min, regenerate Life
	
	
Night Eye

- toggleable and duration of 12 hours
	should you get thru the night
	
	
Seduction

- will never fail again
	magnitude 100
	
	
Vampire Drain

- improved in all stages, 
	stage 1 	20pts
	stage 2		25pts
	stage 3 	35pts
	stage 4		75pts
	
	
Vamp Strength
- unarmed strength improved
	stage 1 	20pts
	stage 2		25pts
	stage 3		35pts
	stage 4		50pts
author: MrMoe777
